p: The aim of this study, was to evaluate the effect of the MD, the whey protein isolate (WPI) and mixture of them (MD-WPI) on the physicochemical properties (chemical composition, water activity, particle size, morphology, reconstitution properties) of a spray dried the bone broth powder (BBP). Besides, some quality parameters (pH, color, thiobarbituric acid reactive substances (TBARS) and browning index) of the powdered the product was determined during storage up to 3 mon.
